Name: DailyHeartlandsNews/OldDukeSpeaks
Body: Fishermen near the Sulphurous Sea swear the 'Fell Progeny Shinryu' (formerly Old Duke) now speaks in guttural verses. One transcript reads: 'I remember the sky before Fovos, the Dreaded descended... when Chrysadia still danced in the heavens.' Marine biologists confirm the beast's vocal cords have mutated, possibly due to prolonged Acid Rain exposure. A cult has formed, interpreting its ramblings as prophecies of 'the return of Auric Dragons'
